response.explain: The previous action code has successfully cooked the garlic clove. The next step is to put the cooked garlic clove on the countertop.
response.subtask:
(1) Open the fridge
(2) Take out the garlic clove
(3) Put the garlic clove on the stove
(4) Cook the garlic clove
(5) Put the cooked garlic clove on the countertop
(6) Take out the butter
(7) Put the cooked garlic clove and butter on the plate
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    # Subtask 5: Put the cooked garlic clove on the countertop
    garlic_clove_209 = registry(env,"garlic_clove_209")
    countertop_tpuwys_6 = registry(env,"countertop_tpuwys_6")
    put_ontop(robot, garlic_clove_209, countertop_tpuwys_6)
    donothing(env)
